MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L24 postcode area of Speke, affecting properties in Speke Hall Road and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.23pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of third-party damage to our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.14pm on 27th April 2021.
